subject: To: Beneficiary
body:
To: Beneficiary
We found out that you were scammed of a huge sum of money by scammers
via Western union and Money Gram, RIA,and also WORLD REMIT.
Nevertheless,the 11 people where selected across the globe for this
new year international compensations payments your email was in the
list submitted by our monitoring team observers and this is why we are
contacting you,this have been agreed upon and have been signed and it
is the duty of my office to be transparent to handle all the
processing of the said fund transfer and i urge you to reconfirm the
following details immediately to my desk for the release of your fund.
1)Name:
2)Address:
3)Tel:
4)Age:
5)Sex:
6)Occupation Status:
Note:that your claim sum of US$2,600,000.00 will be released to you
within 96 Hours without any problem as soon as we confirm the above
requested information from you. Once again we apologize for the delay
and please stop further communication with any office from now
henceforth and pay attention to the release of your payment. I look
forward to hearing from you with required details to enhance the
transfer of your US$2,600,000.00 to you.
Please contact us on our Private E-mail:Reply back to this email
address  for your compensation: 
davidjacksonnewcontact2023@gmail.com
Yours Sincerely,
David Jackson

subject: Re:   To: Beneficiary
body:
Hello David Jackson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I had no idea that my email was selected for such an event. Could you please tell me more about how my email ended up on this list? And what exactly is the role of your monitoring team observers?

Also, could you provide more details about this new year payments program? It sounds very interesting and I would love to learn more about it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Hello: William
body:
TEL: +234) 8033826152
Attention: William

This is to inform you that your email has been received and we
hereby respond accordingly. Note that this program was initiated by
the United Nations is to alleviate the suffering of scammed victims in
effort to receive their fund but all to no avail. Therefore, note that your
name was detected as one of those that has been receiving unsolicited mail
in your mailbox hence you were included along side
others in this on-going compensation program. Please be informed that we
were posted down here in Nigeria to monitor and ensure that all victims on
this compensation list are protected as well as compensated adequately.

Honestly, many foreigners have lost a lot of money to these fraudsters here
in Nigeria and in some other Countries of the world. We are here to make
sure that all foreigners that have unpaid over due fund are all fully paid.

More importantly, your name as well as your email address was detected in
our network hence you were included as one of the beneficiaries in
this program. So, you stand to be paid the sum of $2.6 Million hence the
reason why United Nations have to work together with FBI to make it done.
We have verified your file and as soon as we hear from you, we will forward
the payment proceedings to the the payer bank UNITED BANK OF AFRICA (UBA)
to enable them act upon it and  make the payment
to you via the ATM CARD means of payment accordingly.

Please be informed that your fund is $2.6 Million which would be made to
you through the ATM card means of payment.

Meanwhile, do endeavor to reconfirm the following details to us:

1. Your full names
2. Your Home and office address
3. Your telephone number
4. A scanned copy of any of your valid identity card
5. Your occupation and position and
6. The name of your next of kin.
7. Your scanned copy of your identity Card.

These are the necessary details that would facilitate the processing of
your payment.

Do be informed as well that you will only be obtaining an Insurance cover
certificate cost $759 fees for your package which will serve as a
protective device while it is on transit to your destination address.

At this juncture, you must make sure you stop communications with those
fraudsters to enable us succeed in this mission. So be warned seal up your
lips if you would actually want to receive your fund. For your perusal, do
find attached file for my official identity card for your confirmation. My
phone number is (+234)8033826152 feel free to
call me any time for more clarifications.

Yours Sincerely,
David Jackson
FBI INVESTIGATION FOR ALL FOREIGN PAYMENT.
TEL: +234) 8033826152

subject: Re: To: Beneficiary: William
body:
Hello David Jackson,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to learn about this program initiated by the United Nations and FBI. I must say, it's a noble cause to protect victims and ensure they receive their due funds.

I'm curious though, how was my name detected in your network? And could you please elaborate more on how this ATM card means of payment works? 

Also, I understand that you need some details from me for processing the payment. However, I am not comfortable sharing personal information over email due to security reasons. Is there any other secure way we can proceed with this?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: To: Beneficiary: William.
body:
Beneficiary: William

Thanks for your mail. Please be informed that your name and email address
were specifically detected on the FBI scammed monitoring network alongside
others.  Note as well that an upward number of 18,946 victims had been
detected on our Network since the device was installed and we have
successfully, monitored the payments of 16,381 beneficiaries. So, be rest
assured that yours won't be an exception as we are highly committed to this
exercise.

Meanwhile, be informed that your ATM card would be like any other cards and
could be used to withdraw cash from any ATM machine any where in your City.

We could understand your apprehension, but do note that sending your
details to us would enable us ascertain if truly you are whom we thought
you are. So, it is very sacrosanct under this ongoing compensation exercise.

Our email address is well secured and so, do endeavor to send those
requested details accordiingly to enable us proceed.
Regards
David Jackson
